DOC.brief_title: To Enhance Breast Cancer Survivorship Asian Americans
DOC.detailed_description: Despite study Asian American breast cancer survivor , well know woman shoulder unnecessary burden breast cancer rarely complain symptom pain , delay seek help , rarely ask get support due cultural value beliefs language barrier . This demonstrate definite need support specific population . However , survivorship program increasingly instituted cancer center serious impediment provide information coaching/support lack staff time insurance reimbursement . Furthermore , pressure fast-paced clinical patient-provider interaction leave little time health care provider provide up-to-date information coach support woman base cultural attitude . All circumstance necessitate innovative creative delivery method information coaching/support . A technology- base approach use computer mobile device ( smart phone tablet ) promise meet necessity high flexibility accessibility , minimize cost intervention busy costly health care setting . Also , technology-based intervention involve face-to-face interaction could work well many woman culture breast cancer still stigmatize experience . Therefore , base Preliminary Studies ( PSs ) , research team develop pilot-tested theory-driven technology-based information coaching/support program culturally tailor Asian American breast cancer survivor use multiple feature . The purpose propose randomize intervention study test efficacy technology-based information coaching/support program Asian American breast cancer survivor ( TICAA ) enhance woman 's breast cancer survivorship experience . The specific aim : ) determine whether intervention group show significantly great improvement control group primary outcome ( need help , physical psychological symptom , quality life ) baseline ( pre-test ) Time Points 1 ( post 1-month ) 2 ( post 3-months ) ; b ) identify theory-based variable ( attitude , self-efficacy , perceive barrier , social influence relate breast cancer survivorship ) mediate intervention effect TICAA primary outcome three time point ( pre-test , post 1-month post 3-months ) ; c ) determine whether effect TICAA primary outcome moderate background characteristic disease factor . The propose study guide Bandura 's Theory Behavioral Change . This study adopt randomize repeated measure pretest/posttest control group design 330 Asian American breast cancer survivor . The long-term goal : ( ) implement program various health care setting ; ( b ) determine TICAA lead long-term improved health outcome ; ( c ) fundamentally enhance methodology/paradigm culturally tailor technology-based intervention ethnic minority group breast cancer survivor .
